about_the_game:
This DLC contains a few goodies for you to enjoy outside of the main game.

To see the content, browse to the game's installation path (YOUR_STEAM_FOLDER\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Lands of Sorcery\) and open the "Barbarian Supporter Pack" folder

Storyboard Panels

Collection of 20 storyboard panels that were used as the base for the pencil drawing panels used in the Gloomy Whisper campaign cut scenes.
17 in UHD 4k, 3 in QHD 1440p

Wallpapers

5 wallpapers without any text or logo. Just beautiful backdrops from the game, available in 16:9 and 16:10 ratios, from FullHD to UltraHD resolutions.

Soundtrack

  • 01. Bound Forever - Jasmin Mišić - 4:57
  • 02. Battle Win 1 - Matteo Bosi - 0:05
  • 03. Battle Win 2 - Matteo Bosi - 0:04
  • 04. Battle Win 3 - Matteo Bosi - 0:05
  • 05. Expedition Complete 1 - Matteo Bosi - 0:07
  • 06. Expedition Complete 2 - Matteo Bosi - 0:06
  • 07. Day of Reckoning - Andrew Hind - 2:32
  • 08. Glory Rising - Andrew Hind - 4:29
  • 09. Nightfall - WOW Sound - 1:17
  • 10. Peaceful Borders - WOW Sound - 1:51
  • 11. Lurking Soul - WOW Sound - 1:48
  • 12. Prepare For Battle - Andrew Hind - 2:25
  • 13. Stronger Together - Andrew Hind - 2:38

content_descriptors.notes: Some images contain full frontal female nudity
